OVH US is a global, hyper-scale cloud provider that offers businesses industry-leading performance and value. Vertically integrated to own its network, server technology and green data centers, OVH US operates more cost effectively and passes these benefits back to customers. Controlling each step in the value chain allows OVH US to provide the best performance, price, security, and customer service in the industry. OVH US is a subsidiary of OVH Group, the largest European hosting provider, with more than one million customers across 138 countries and four continents. We’re hiring - check out our company LinkedIn page for more details on how you can join our team!

I believe that everyone’s voice should be heard and we saw icitizen as the solution to increase civic engagement. I went in to build a team, rebrand, reinvent the technology, and launch the first platform for anyone to submit issues directly to decision makers - all with anonymous verification. We used the terabytes of publicly available data, online social channels, and an easy to use solution for citizens to submit and vote on issues. Decision makers can now go to one nonpartisan location to learn what their constituents, employees, students, customers, and general public really think about any issue.
icitizen named an IDC Innovator for U.S. Political Engagement Mobile App Market

Over 125,000 customers in 100 countries now rely on Media Temple's easy-to-use tools for domain registration, web hosting, business applications, virtual servers, and other cloud services to power more than 1.5 million websites. Media Temple's customers range from everyday people to top bloggers, creative professionals, and small businesses, as well as large enterprises like Starbucks, Adidas, Samsung, and Toyota.Media Temple has been repeatedly recognized as one of the fastest growing companies in North America—and one of the best places to work in Los Angeles.
GoDaddy Buys Media Temple To Build Up Its Business With Web Professionals

CEO, President & Board Member (Acquired by RR Donnelley - Nasdaq: RRD)

In August, 2011, we successfully sold LibreDigital to RR Donnelley.  LibreDigital develops technology that helps consumers to discover and read their favorite books, newspapers and magazines when and where they choose to read. The company’s solutions power the promotion, sales and delivery of content on-demand across the web or to any marketplace or device – including the Apple iPad and iBookstore, Google, Amazon Kindle, Kindle Fire, Barnes & Noble NOOK, Sony Reader, the Blio eReader, and the Bookish Reading Club in the Starbucks Digital Network.LibreDigital has served billions of page views to millions of readers worldwide. The company’s customers and partners include Apple, Barnes & Noble, Baker & Taylor, Hachette Book Group, HarperCollins, Kaplan, The New York Times, Simon & Schuster, and Sony. Was backed by Adams Capital Management, Triangle Peak Partners, S3 Ventures, Noro-Moseley Partners, and HarperCollins Publishers, LibreDigital is based in Austin, Texas, with offices in New York and London.
Designed to Connect, Inform and Entertain, the Starbucks Digital Network, in partnership with Yahoo!, Debuts at Starbucks

I had the honor of working with Russ Reeder for over a year and I cannot speak highly enough of him. He is the epitome of what a true leader is. He has a way of inspiring you to give 110% in all that you do. He allows those he leads to be creative and is their "number one cheerleader" every step of the way. Russ has this amazing ability to get the most out of people while still reminding you that there is more to life than just your job. He brings a fresh passionate approach to business and leadership. The lessons I have learned from him, both professionally and personally, are endless and I will take them with me wherever I go.

As CEO of LibreDigital, Russ provided the vision and leadership which enabled the company to consistently exceed revenue projections, ultimately resulting in its acquisition by RR Donnelley.  Russ emphasized creating a team that would be the company's competitive advantage.  He focused on proactively communicating with all shareholders, whether negotiating agreements with key customers, reporting to the Board of Directors or communicating strategic vision to employees.  His drive and determination inspired the company as a whole.   I will always remember Russ' frequent reminders - that success is a journey, not a destination.  His leadership skills are second to none and I am happy to provide Russ with my strongest recommendation.

summary: Russ is a 22+ tech and branding exec. His hi-tech background ranges from start-up ventures to Fortune 500 giants like Oracle and his first programming job at Mobil Oil.  Russ has managed high-growth global organizations that have transformed industries and consistently drives customer centric performance and innovation at scale. Before OVH, Russ led the premium cloud hosting company, Media Temple (mt), where he was responsible for the company’s brand, strategic direction, culture and operational execution. Russ also implemented successful global omnichannel customer strategies across mobile, media, online, social and other direct to consumer channels. Before Media Temple, Russ lead the growth of LibreDigital, the leader in digital publishing.Prior to that, Russ led NxTV to the forefront of the direct to consumer Internet TV and Internet video-on-demand industry, scaling its 200 global locations and operations and boosting both profits and revenue.Throughout his career and his life beyond business, Russ has been an attentive student of change and innovation. He sees the best opportunities as disruptive -- the very best ones as those that promise to increase efficiency in large markets and improve lives.  He continues to hone and apply a leadership philosophy first inspired by his family and then his professional mentors.  He owes much to his experiences as a dad, a triathlete and, simply enough, a human being just trying to do a better job whatever the challenge happens to be.  More than anything, Russ is committed to helping others live happier, more productive lives. Read about his leadership philosophy on his blog, http://russreeder.com/h-e-a-r-leadership Graduate and Commencement Address speaker, James Madison University (JMU) http://bit.ly/JMUCommencementAddress
name: Russell P Reeder
